mapper.select: select a.userId, a.userParentId, a.userSysId, a.name, a.gender, a.birthdate, a.cellphone, a.email, a.credentialType, a.isSoldier, a.isDisablity, a.height, a.weight, a.nationality, a.nativePlace, a.marriageStatus, a.householdType, a.education, a.policticsStatus, a.homePhone, a.homeAddress, a.workingAge, a.salary, a.companyName, a.companyAddress from tab_user a where a.userName = #{userName} and a.userPass = #{userPass}

select a.userId, a.userParentId, a.userSysId, a.name, a.gender, a.birthdate, a.cellphone, a.email, a.credentialType, a.isSoldier, a.isDisablity, a.height, a.weight, a.nationality, a.nativePlace, a.marriageStatus, a.householdType, a.education, a.policticsStatus, a.homePhone, a.homeAddress, a.workingAge, a.salary, a.companyName, a.companyAddress from tab_user a where a.userId = #{userId}

select a.userId, a.userParentId, a.userSysId, a.name, a.gender, a.birthdate, a.cellphone, a.email, a.credentialType, a.isSoldier, a.isDisablity, a.height, a.weight, a.nationality, a.nativePlace, a.marriageStatus, a.householdType, a.education, a.policticsStatus, a.homePhone, a.homeAddress, a.workingAge, a.salary, a.companyName, a.companyAddress from tab_user_nurse_relation c inner join tab_user a on a.userId = c.nurseId where c.userId = #{userId}
select count(1) as cnt from tab_service t where (t.serviceType=2 and t.serviceCreatorId in (select nurseId from tab_user_nurse_relation b where b.userId=#{creatorId})) or (t.serviceTYpe<>2)

select a.id, a.serviceType, a.serviceName, a.serviceCreatorId, a.serviceCreateTime, a.serviceStartDate, a.serviceDuration, a.serviceMemo, a.serviceIcon from tab_service a where (a.serviceType=2 and a.serviceCreatorId in (select nurseId from tab_user_nurse_relation b where b.userId=#{creatorId})) or (a.serviceTYpe<>2) order by a.serviceCreateTime desc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}
select count(1) as cnt from tab_activity t where (t.activityType=2 and t.activityCreatorId in (select nurseId from tab_user_nurse_relation b where b.userId=#{creatorId})) or (t.activityType<>2)

select a.activityId, a.activityType, a.activityName, a.activityCreatorId, a.activityCreateTime, a.activityStartDate, a.activityDuration, a.activityMemo, a.activityIcon from tab_activity a where (a.activityType=2 and a.activityCreatorId in (select nurseId from tab_user_nurse_relation b where b.userId=#{creatorId})) or (a.activityType<>2) order by a.activityCreateTime desc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}
select count(1) as cnt from tab_news t
select a.id, a.newsTitle, date_format(a.newsCreateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as newsCreateTime, newsIcon from tab_news a order by a.newsCreateTime desc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}

select count(1) as cnt from (select a.id, a.userId, a.adviceTypId, b.typeName, max(a.adviceTime) as adviceTime, a.adviceContent from tab_doctor_advice a inner join tab_dict_doctor_advice_type b on b.typeId=a.adviceTypId where a.userId=#{userId} group by a.adviceTypId ) aa
